pluginDescription.message: A sidebar assistant to manage your conversation history on ChatGPT.

filterStarred.description: Label for the star filter checkbox.

emptyStateHeader.description: Header text when the conversation list is empty.

emptyStateDescription.message: Messages you send will appear here.
emptyStateDescription.description: Description text when the conversation list is empty.

emptyStateStarredHeader.description: Header text when the conversation list is empty in starred mode.

emptyStateStarredDescription.message: Click the star next to a conversation to favorite it.
emptyStateStarredDescription.description: Description text when the conversation list is empty in starred mode.

toggleButton.description: Text for the button that toggles the sidebar.

addStarTitle.description: Tooltip for the button to star a conversation.

removeStarTitle.description: Tooltip for the button to unstar a conversation.
